short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: display the top/hot/new most recent post quickly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reddit Quick Post allows you to quickly search for a top or hot post from reddit without having to visit the site itself.

- Click on the title to go to the post
- Click on the comments to be sent to the comment page
- Click on the subreddit to view the subreddit 

Type in a subreddit, choose you settings, and press return!
